alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:29PM EDT until July 29 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dickenson County in southwestern Virginia... Southern Buchanan County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ashcamp to near Clintwood to Wise to near Big Stone Gap, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clintwood, Grundy, Haysi, Breaks Interstate, Davenport, John Flannagan Lake, Big Rock, Trammel, Clinchco, Oakwood, Nora, Vansant, and McClure. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
